title: 🎡🎡🎡 SUPER LARGE STUDIOS! 🎡🎡🎡
posting_body: ['Kensington Suites has studio apartments are 380 Square Feet - with a kitchenette and private bathroom.', 'Our 1-bedroom apartments are 580 Square Feet - with a spacious open concept living room and kitchen, and includes a spacious bedroom and full-size bathroom.', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', '-Swimming pool open during summer months.', "We also have a laundry facility on site for our resident's convenience.", 'FLOOR PLANS:', 'Studio Apartment Homes - 380 Square Feet with a private full-size bathroom @', 'ONLY: Move-in TOTAL $613.00 for 1st bi-weekly, weekly after move-in is $283.00.', '1 Bedroom Apartment Homes - 580 Square Feet with a private full-size bathroom @', 'ONLY: Move-in TOTAL $653.00 for 1st bi-weekly, weekly after move-in is $303.00', 'ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:', '-We are conveniently located walking distance to grocery shopping and on RTC Bus Line.', 'We are close to Freeway Access which gets you downtown within minutes, fine dining and entertainment.', 'AMENITIES:', '-All utilities included Water, Sewer, Trash, Electric and Extended Basic Cable including SHOWTIME.', 'Full size Fridge and Stoves.', 'Relaxing sparkling pool and on-site laundry facilities.', 'PET POLICY:', '-$200 non-refundable pet Deposit and $45 pet rent monthly or 15 Weekly.', 'Weight and breed restrictions do apply.', 'COME ON DOWN TO TAKE A TOUR OF OUR BEAUTIFUL COMMUNITY!!!', 'We would love to move you in as soon as possible and all RENTALS stop half an hour before closing so COME ONE COME ALL 😊', 'Call Office for more information', 'show contact info', ', thank you kindly.']
